product_name: Garmin Forerunner 220 GPS Heart Rate Monitor
long_description: Get motivating feedback with the Garmin Forerunner 220 GPS heart rate monitor. Track distance, pace and heart rate (with included chest strap and sensor), and get a post-run summary. Forerunner 220 offers vibration alerts, a color display, button operation and a hinged wristband that fits any size wrist. Built-in accelerometer tracks distance for your indoor track or treadmill workouts, with no need for a foot pod. The Forerunner 220 also tracks your personal records and has features such as automatic uploads to Garmin Connect(TM), live tracking and social media sharing. Pair the Garmin Forerunner 220 GPS heart rate monitor with free training plans from Garmin Connect for real-time coaching.
